ygData.subject: Re: Text loss while switching screens
ygData.msgSnippet: I just checked the Verant official message board, and yes, the text dissapearance bug only seems to affect bards and people in their group. Mabye it s just
ygData.messageBody:
I just checked the Verant official message board, and yes, the text
dissapearance bug only seems to affect bards and people in their group.

Mabye it's just that we fill up our text window buffer with song spam faster
than most people do, but Esther is aware of the problem and is actually
testing it (wow, scary huh?)

Maybe we should mention that it only happens while playing lullaby against
way green mobs... lol

Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 42 Missed Notes
Crimson Legacy, E'ci
